repos.description: Alokai is a Frontend as a Service solution that simplifies composable commerce. It connects all the technologies needed to build and deploy fast & scalable ecommerce frontends. It guides merchants to deliver exceptional customer experiences quickly and easily.
Open source headless commerce that’s fast, flexible, and built to scale,launch stunning storefronts that convert and grow your business without limits.
A performant frontend ecommerce starter template with Next.js

🏬 relivator: next.js 15 react 19 ecommerce template ▲ better-auth polar shadcn/ui tailwind drizzle orm typescript ts radix, postgres neon, app router saas commerce ecommerce shop pricing payments dark mode full stack free ⭐ more stars 👉 more features
💀 Headless Shopify Starter – powered by Next.js + Sanity.io
⚡ Next.js enterprise-grade storefront for high-performance e-commerce with Shopify backend and Algolia middle layer with excellent browsing journey

Example Storefront is Reaction Commerce’s headless ecommerce storefront - Next.js, GraphQL, React. Built using Apollo Client and the commerce-focused React UI components provided in the Storefront Component Library (reactioncommerce/reaction-component-library). It connects with Reaction backend with the GraphQL API.
An embedded Shopify app starter template made with Next.js and Prisma ORM, with all the required stuff hooked up.
The ultimate starter for headless Shopify stores
Official Medusa B2B Starter template. Features common B2B ecommerce requirements and can be easily adapted and extended.
✨ Open-Source Full-stack E-Commerce Storefront with CMS Admin Panel. Built with Typescript, Next.js 14 App Dir, Tailwind CSS ( @shadcn-ui ) and Prisma. Admin Panel: https://pardis.vercel.app
Shopify Storefront Boilerplate Using Nextjs and Tailwindcss
Shopco - Free Next.js 14 App Router, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, shadcn-ui, framer-motion, redux toolkit E-commerce Website.
Astro Powered Shopify Storefront Boilerplate with TailwindCSS and Nanostores.

A Turborepo monorepo integrating a Medusa2 backend with a Remix frontend, featuring a Coffee Roast themed dynamic storefront. Includes Stripe payment integration, scalability with unlimited products and categories, and a developer-friendly setup using TypeScript and Biome. Ideal for rapidly building scalable e-commerce stores.
Ship better storefronts 🛍
A storefront starter kit for Vendure built with Remix
🚀🚀 A Shopify embedded app starter template, written in TypeScript with session storage, app context and examples for basic functionalities.
📱 Combine your Medusa.js e-commerce backend and/or web storefront with a Expo mobile app that matches Medusa  @nextjs  starter functionality, look and feel.
A lightweight and powerful ecommerce starter theme to build headless Shopify storefronts with Astro.
🛍️ A dazzlingly fast E-Commerce solution built with Typescript and NextJS.
